Description: A straightforward adventure for a straightforward warrior.
Rules Description: Standard Rules.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~[;]~Equipment:Swordstave~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:Shield Synthesis~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You've got two battle axes and all your equipment is|upgraded! Awesome! Also[;] you're extremely cursed!
Rules Description: Start with two upgraded [yellow]Battle Axes[].|All equipment you find is upgraded.|Inflicted with [curse]Curse[] at the start of every turn.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield+~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang+~[;]~Equipment:Swordstave+~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash+~[;]~Equipment:Pirate Hook+~|~Equipment:Shield Synthesis+~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You seem pretty tough! Do you really need all that health?|Nah[;] you'll be fine without it.
Rules Description: Start with a [yellow]Venus Fly Trap[].|Lose [heart]2[] max hp when you level up.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Midnight Charm~[;]~Equipment:Swordstave~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Equipment:Last Stand~[;]~Equipment:Shield Synthesis~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You've got your usual equipment[;] usual health[;] everything.|It's a shame all your enemies have extra health and|upgraded weapons.
Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|All enemy equipment is upgraded.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~[;]~Equipment:Swordstave~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:Shield Synthesis~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Woah[;] everything's different!
Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Crescent Moon Blade~[;]~Equipment:Shifting Sword~[;]~Equipment:Polar Star~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Battering Ram~[;] ~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:Maintenance~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var swords = [~InitialEquipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~InitialEquipment:Katana~[;]~InitialEquipment:Sword~[;] ~InitialEquipment:Rusty Sword~[;]~InitialEquipment:Battle Axe~]; var smalls = [~DoubleEquipment:Boxing Gloves[;]Boxing Gloves~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Claw[;]Claw~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Boomerang[;]Small Shield~]; var fluffswords = [~InitialEquipment:Pike~[;]~InitialEquipment:Halberd~[;]~InitialEquipment:Swordstave~[;]~InitialEquipment:Labrys~];var fluffsmalls = [~DoubleEquipment:Fulcrum Blade[;]Budge~[;]~DoubleEquipment:drowS[;]Nudge~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Rodela[;]Candle~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Thump[;]Lantern Shield~]; if(rand([0|1]) == 1){smalls = smalls.concat(fluffsmalls); chooseinitialequipment([rand(swords)|rand(smalls)|rand(fluffswords)]);}else{swords = swords.concat(fluffswords);  chooseinitialequipment([rand(swords)|rand(smalls)|rand(fluffsmalls)]);}; leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Crescent Moon Blade~[;] ~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;] ~Equipment:Polar Star~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~[;]~Equipment:Katana~[;]~Equipment:Shifting Sword~[;]~Equipment:Swordstave~]; var rewards2 = [~Equipment:Battering Ram~[;] ~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Equipment:Charge!~[;] ~Equipment:Candle~[;]~Equipment:Shield Synthesis~]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2);  leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 3); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rewards2.pop()[;] ~Upgrade~[;]rewards2.pop()][;]3); }; trace(levelupselections);

Description: Business as usual: get in[;] rob a few enemies[;] defeat the|boss[;] get out.
Rules Description: Standard Rules.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;]~Equipment:Shatter~[;]~Equipment:Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Get those pickpocketing fingers ready - this time[;] you're|stealing for keeps.
Rules Description: You can keep enemy equipment after each fight.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;]~Equipment:Shatter~[;]~Equipment:Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: On your first turn[;] all your dice roll 1. On your second[;]|they roll 2. Third time lucky? Nope[;] third time you roll a 3.
Rules Description: On your first turn[;] all dice rolls are 1.|Second turn[;] all dice rolls are 2.|... and so on.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Kunai~[;] ~Equipment:Crackleslash~[;] ~Equipment:Hall of Mirrors~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Backstab~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Before Start Turn: var uptick = self.getvar(~uptick~); Rules.stackplayerdice([[uptick]][;] true); self.replaceskillcard(~Uptick@~ + uptick);
Script: End Turn: var uptick = self.getvar(~uptick~) + 1; if(uptick >=7) uptick = 1; self.setvar(~uptick~[;] uptick);
Script: After Combat: var uptick = self.getvar(~uptick~) + 1; if(uptick >=7) uptick = 1; self.setvar(~uptick~[;] uptick);

Description: You've got your usual equipment[;] usual health[;] everything.|It's a shame all your enemies have extra health and|upgraded weapons.
Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|All enemy equipment is upgraded.

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var poison = [~DoubleEquipment:Poison Needle[;]Hacksaw~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Rat[;]Rat~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Poison Slingshot[;]Gooplicate~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Rend[;]Quartz Cauldron~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Rat[;]Poison Needle~]; var spam = [~DoubleEquipment:Dagger[;]Lockpick~[;] ~DoubleEquipment:Dagger[;]Berlin Key~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Nunchucks[;]Master Key~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Dagger[;]Copper Cauldron~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Shotgun[;]Forgery~]; var counts = [~DoubleEquipment:Wrecking Ball[;]Pea Shooter~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Chain Whip[;]Chain Whip~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Wrecking Ball[;]Blade of JOAT~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Wrecking Ball[;]Metalmorph~]; chooseinitialequipment([rand(poison)[;]rand(spam)[;]rand(counts)]); leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;] ~Equipment:Dagger~[;] rand([~Equipment:Lockpick~[;] ~Equipment:Shatter~])[;] rand([~Equipment:Crowbar~[;] ~Equipment:Wrecking Ball~])[;] ~Equipment:Seesaw~]; var rewards2 = [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Equipment:Backstab~[;] ~Equipment:Berlin Key~[;] ~Equipment:Bronze Cauldron~[;] ~Equipment:Nunchucks~[;]~Equipment:Slingshot~]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); for(r in rewards1){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards1.remove(r); } for(r in rewards2){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards2.remove(r); } leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 3); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [rewards2.pop()[;] rewards2.pop()[;] ~Upgrade~]); }

Description: Nothing fancy: just calculation and altercation.
Rules Description: Standard Rules.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Drill Arm~[;]~Equipment:Ultima Weapon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Heat Sink~[;]~Equipment:Inspect Element~[;]~Equipment:Increment~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);

Description: Ah[;] time for more dice! Unfortunately[;] there's a slight|problem: for complicated reasons that we won't go into|here[;] for this episode[;] you can't have two dice showing|the same number...
Rules Description: Duplicate dice vanish immediately.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Drill Arm~[;]~Equipment:Ultima Weapon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Heat Sink~[;]~Equipment:Inspect Element~[;]~Equipment:Increment~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);

Rules Description: No CPU counter. Create any dice you like!|50% chance that equipment will randomly disappear each time.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Ruby Weapon~[;]~Equipment:Butterfly Edge~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;][~Equipment:Jack's Pot~[;]~Equipment:Lute Bocks~[;]~Equipment:Autoscroll~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);

Script: Start Game: Rules.setalternate(~all~); Rules.enemyhpadjust = 1.1; Rules.jackpotskills = [~One More Roll~|~Regenerate~|~Lucky Shot~|~Barricade~|~Snake Eyes~|~Firebomb~|~Protection~|~Refrigerator~|~Magic Lantern~|~Steel Skin~|~Revitalize~]; Rules.jackpotskills_lowodds = [~Fury~|~Teleport~|~Hook~|~Bear Smash~|~Jackhammer~|~Heat Ray~|~JOAT Smash~]; Rules.excludeenemies([~Banshee~[;]~Loud Bird~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Rhino Beetle~[;]~Paper Knight~[;]~Gargoyle~]);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var jackpots = [~DoubleEquipment:Phaser[;]Overclock~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Pea Shooter[;]Missing Score~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Spud Cannon[;]Missing Score~];var rolls = [~DoubleEquipment:Garbage Collection[;]Coolant Shooter~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Ray Gun[;]Plasma Blaster~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Pea Shooter[;]Overclock~];var counts = [~DoubleEquipment:Overheat[;]Junkblaster~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Spud Cannon[;]Spatula~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Plasma Blaster[;]Pea Shooter~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Blutsauger[;]Plasma Blaster~];chooseinitialequipment([rand(jackpots)|rand(rolls)|rand(counts)]); leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);
Script: Start Game: Rules.remix = true; Rules.jackpotskills = [~One More Roll~|~Regenerate~|~Lucky Shot~|~Barricade~|~Snake Eyes~|~Firebomb~|~Protection~|~Refrigerator~|~Magic Lantern~|~Steel Skin~|~Revitalize~]; Rules.jackpotskills_lowodds = [~Fury~|~Teleport~|~Hook~|~Bear Smash~|~Jackhammer~|~Heat Ray~|~JOAT Smash~]; Rules.excludeenemies([~Banshee~[;]~Loud Bird~[;]~Scathach~]);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards1 = [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Ultima Weapon~[;]~Equipment:Stack Overflow~[;]~Equipment:Precious Egg@6~[;]~Equipment:Drill Arm~[;]~Equipment:Chronomancy~[;]~Equipment:Butterfly Edge~]; var rewards2 = [rand([~Equipment:Cooling Fan~[;]~Equipment:Heat Sink~])[;]rand([~Equipment:Concatenate~[;]~Equipment:Increment~])[;]rand([~Equipment:Bucket of Water~[;]~Equipment:Inspect Element~])]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] rewards1[;] 3); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] rewards2[;] 3); }

Rules Description: Standard Rules.

Rules Description: Find extra equipment.|Start with double equipment[;] and upgraded [yellow]Hammers[].|Make twice as many gadgets.

Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var swordlikes = [~InitialEquipment:Hammer~[;]~InitialEquipment:Screwdriver~[;] ~InitialEquipment:Shovel~[;]~InitialEquipment:Whip~[;]~InitialEquipment:Lament~[;]~InitialEquipment:Leech Seed~[;]~InitialEquipment:Nine Iron~[;]~InitialEquipment:Sapping Spores~[;]~InitialEquipment:Canesword~[;]~InitialEquipment:Starsword~[;]~InitialEquipment:Breakthrough~]; var beams = [~DoubleEquipment:Dynamo[;]Focus Beam~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Focus Beam[;]Focus Beam~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Solar Beam[;]Solar Beam~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Dynamo[;]Solar Beam~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Terra Beam[;]Terra Beam~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Dynamo[;]Terra Beam~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Lunar Beam[;]Lunar Beam~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Dynamo[;]Lunar Beam~]; var x = rand(swordlikes); var y = x; while(y == x){y = rand(swordlikes);};chooseinitialequipment([x|rand(beams)|y]);  leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;] ~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Woah[;] everything's different!
Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Sun Beam~[;]~Spell:Lucky 7~[;] ~Spell:Cold Snap~[;] ~Spell:Carnation~[;] ~Spell:Swingset~[;] ~Spell:Wisteria~]| 3); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Magnifying Glass~[;]  ~Spell:Daffodil~[;] ~Spell:Camellia~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]);

Description: Everything's back to normal again! Until you go down|a floor - the further you go into the dungeons[;] the more|the rules change...
Rules Description: Start with standard rules.|Gain bonus rules as you descend further.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var vanillaupgrade; var PUupgrade; var fluffupgrade; if(chance(50)){ vanillaupgrade = rand([~Spell:Burning Light~|~Spell:Electric Shock~|~Spell:Ice Shard~]); PUupgrade = rand([~Spell:Sun Beam~|~Spell:Lucky 7~|~Spell:Cold Snap~|~Spell:Carnation~| ~Spell:Swingset~| ~Spell:Wisteria~]); fluffupgrade = rand([~Spell:Leech Soul~|~Spell:Sonic Wave~|~Spell:Venom Bolt~]); }else{ vanillaupgrade = rand([~Spell:Burning Light~|~Spell:Electric Shock~|~Spell:Ice Shard~|~Spell:Leech Soul~|~Spell:Sonic Wave~|~Spell:Venom Bolt~]); PUupgrade = rand([~Spell:Sun Beam~|~Spell:Lucky 7~|~Spell:Cold Snap~]); fluffupgrade = rand([~Spell:Carnation~| ~Spell:Swingset~| ~Spell:Wisteria~]); } var rewards1 = [vanillaupgrade|PUupgrade|fluffupgrade]; rewards1 = shuffle(rewards1); var cauldron = [~DoubleEquipment:Stew Pot[;]Infliction~[;] ~DoubleEquipment:Fruit Bowl[;]Infliction~[;] ~DoubleEquipment:Quartz Cauldron[;]Rend~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Cauldron[;]Snapdragon~]; var nomana = [~DoubleEquipment:Electrum Cauldron[;]Steamball~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Rockfall[;]Snapdragon~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Bite[;]Crocus~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Primal Punch[;]Budge~]; var combos = [~DoubleEquipment:Flower Pot[;]Stinging Nettle~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Fruit Bowl[;]Bloodroot~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Dock Leaf[;]Rosebud~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Stew Pot[;]Pod Shooter~]; chooseinitialequipment([rand(cauldron)[;]rand(nomana)[;]rand(combos)]); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;][~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;][~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;][~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] rewards1);
Script: Change Floor: if(getcurrentfloor() == 2){ var rewards2 = [rand([~Spell:Doppeldice~[;]~Spell:Magnifying Glass~])[;]  ~Spell:Duplicate~[;] ~Spell:Daffodil~[;] ~Spell:Camellia~]; rewards2 = shuffle(rewards2); for(r in rewards2){ if(levelupselections.indexOf(r) != -1) rewards2.remove(r); } leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] rewards2[;] 3); }

Description: Keep your cards close to your chest... oh yeah[;] by the|way[;] you have cards now.
Rules Description: Standard Rules.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var vanilla = [~Boosterpack:Ice Shatter[;]Snowflake[;]Snowflake~[;]~Boosterpack:Flame Blast[;]Spark[;]Spark~[;]~Boosterpack:High Voltage[;]Buzzer[;]Buzzer~[;]~Boosterpack:Detonator[;]Liquorice[;]Liquorice~[;]~Boosterpack:Shield Bash[;]Deflect[;]Deflect~]; var fluff = [~Boosterpack:Firecracker[;]Bang Snaps[;]Bang Snaps~[;]~Boosterpack:Mace[;]Boopin' Stick[;]Boopin' Stick~[;]~Boosterpack:Pristine Sword[;]Sweets[;]Sweets~]; var v1 = rand([0|1|2|3|4]); var v2 = v1; while(v1 == v2){v1 = rand([0|1|2|3|4]);}; var total = [vanilla[v1]|vanilla[v2]|fluff[rand([0|1|2])]]; leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;]total[;] 3);  leveluprewards(3[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~[;][]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor~][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot~[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~[;][])
Script: After Level Up: trace(levelupselections); var rewards = [[~Boosterpack:Shield Bash[;]Deflect[;]Deflect~[;]~Iron Shield~[;][~Sweets[;]Deflect[;]Sweets~[;] ~Sweets[;]Shield Bash[;]Deflect~[;] ~Deflect[;]Deflect[;]Deflect~]][;][~Boosterpack:Ice Shatter[;]Snowflake[;]Snowflake~[;]~Lament~[;][~Snowflake[;]Spark[;]Snowflake~[;]~Boop[;]Snowball[;]Boop~[;] ~Boop[;]Lament[;]Boop~]][;][~Boosterpack:Detonator[;]Liquorice[;]Liquorice~[;]~Claw~[;][~Liquorice[;]Liquorice[;]Liquorice~[;] ~Liquorice[;]Claw[;]Sweets~[;] ~Sweets[;]Liquorice[;]Sweets~]][;][~Boosterpack:High Voltage[;]Buzzer[;]Buzzer~[;]~Hammer~[;][~Buzzer[;]Hammer[;]Buzzer~[;] ~High Voltage[;]Spark[;]High Voltage~ [;] ~Tazer[;]Whisper[;]Tazer~]][;][~Boosterpack:Flame Blast[;]Spark[;]Spark~[;]~Whip~[;][~Spark[;]Spark[;]Spark~[;] ~Buzzer[;]Whip[;]Buzzer~[;] ~Buzzer[;]Spark[;]Buzzer~]][;][~Boosterpack:Firecracker[;]Bang Snaps[;]Bang Snaps~[;]~Firecracker~[;][~Sparkler[;]Firecracker[;]Sparkler~[;] ~Bang Snaps[;]Bang Snaps[;]Bang Snaps~ [;] ~Sparkler[;]Firecracker[;]Sparkler~]][;][~Boosterpack:Mace[;]Boopin' Stick[;]Boopin' Stick~[;]~Chain Whip~[;][~Liquorice[;]Staff[;]Liquorice~[;] ~Dice Storage[;]Crossbow[;]Dice Storage~[;] ~Buckler[;]Paintbrush[;]Buckler~]][;][~Boosterpack:Pristine Sword[;]Sweets[;]Sweets~[;]~Venus Fly Trap~[;][~Life Rip[;]Blood Suck[;]Life Rip~[;] ~Life Drain[;]Piercing Scroll[;]Life Drain~[;] ~Sweets[;]Healing Crystal[;]Sweets~]][;][~Boosterpack:Gem Generator[;]Fire Gem[;]Ice Gem~[;]~Sword~[;][~Fire Gem[;]Fire Siphon[;]Fire Gem~[;]~Ice Gem[;]Deep Freeze[;]Ice Gem~[;]~Venom Gem[;]Blunt Gem[;]Venom Gem~]]]; for(i in rewards){if(levelupselections.indexOf(i[0]) > -1){Rules.substitute(~Two Handed Sword~[;]i[1]); Rules.substitute(~Bop[;]Bop[;]Bop~[;]rand(i[2]));}};

Description: A straightforward adventure for a straightforward warrior.|But you're a jester so[;] uh...
Rules Description: Standard Rules.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~[;]~Equipment:Swordstave~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:Shield Scrap~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Hey[;] wouldn't it be cool if you stole ALL of an enemy's|equipment[;] every time you fought? Let's find out!
Rules Description: After defeating an enemy[;] keep all of their equipment.|New [yellow]Delete[] skills destroys cards permanently.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;]~Equipment:Duplicate~[;] []); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Delete~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You've got your usual equipment[;] usual health[;] everything.|It's a shame all your enemies have extra health and|upgraded weapons.
Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|All enemy equipment is upgraded.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: var vanilla = [~Boosterpack:Ice Shatter[;]Snowflake[;]Snowflake~[;]~Boosterpack:Flame Blast[;]Spark[;]Spark~[;]~Boosterpack:High Voltage[;]Buzzer[;]Buzzer~[;]~Boosterpack:Detonator[;]Liquorice[;]Liquorice~[;]~Boosterpack:Shield Bash[;]Deflect[;]Deflect~]; var fluff = [~Boosterpack:Firecracker[;]Bang Snaps[;]Bang Snaps~[;]~Boosterpack:Mace[;]Boopin' Stick[;]Boopin' Stick~[;]~Boosterpack:Pristine Sword[;]Sweets[;]Sweets~]; var v1 = rand([0|1|2|3|4]); var v2 = v1; while(v1 == v2){v1 = rand([0|1|2|3|4]);}; var total = [vanilla[v1]|vanilla[v2]|fluff[rand([0|1|2])]]; leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;]total[;] 3);  leveluprewards(3[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~[;][]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor~][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot~[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~[;][])
